title: Road To Emmaus: The New Deal
description: THE COLD WAR OF THE AGES BETWEEN THE ULTIMATE PRESIDING FORCES OF INEVITABILITY - DEATH VERSUS LIFE"A superbly crafted fictional tale that is remarkably created around real events. I was completely caught up and captivated from the onset of this exceptional story. Carlson is an extraordinary writer whose ability to create a well-written story will keep his readers transfixed on every page. And, there are so many ingenious twists and turns in this novel - I simply couldn't put it down." - Artisan Book ReviewsWhat if the true story of yourself placed you in the crosshairs of a colliding ancient and modern world?An epic journey through our battle-scarred history woven across the physical and spiritual realms to how we arrived at our present times. A fast-moving, thought-provoking must read!
author: Sean William Carlson
